fields_of_interest: Public Health, Digital economy and society
head_office_address: c/o Berkeley Townsend Hunter House,  150 Hutton Road
inter_groups: European Medicines Agency and Member States Health Authorities
eu_initiatives:
All Directives and Regulations concerning the reesarch, development and manufacture of medicinal products and medical devices. Including but not limited to: 
- Clinical Trial Regulation 
- Medical Devices Directive 
- EudraLex Volume 10 
- Good Laboratory Practice 
- Good Manufacturing Practice 
Initiatives relating to record keeping, including but not limited to: 
- Archival standards e.g. PDF/A 
- Electronic communications and electronic signatures
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication: HSRAA is actively involved in all aspects of regulation relating to drug/device R&D, manufacturing and distribution.
